tasks.label: up: devcontainer-compose
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml -f .devcontainer/docker-compose-devcontainer.yml up --wait --wait-timeout 60 -d fittrackee fittrackee-db redis mail fittrackee_client

tasks.label: build: dev-fittrackee
tasks.command: bash -lc 'if [ -z "$(docker images -q fittrackee-fittrackee)" ]; then docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml build fittrackee; else echo "[skip] fittrackee-fittrackee exists, skipping build"; fi'
